column2: Did the mother have any fertility therapy to get pregnant this time?
Enter 1 if the woman had intrauterine insemination, 0 otherwise.
A fertility drug such as Clomiphene (Clomid) or Perganol. Enter 1 if the woman was treated with a fertility drug, 0 otherwise.
A procedure such as IVF or ICSI. Enter 1 if the woman had a fertility procedure, 0 otherwise. Note that the mother may have more than one of the fertility therapies.
If Q2b = YES: What drug(s)? Please identify all fertility drug types here:
If Q2c = YES: What fertility procedure was used? Please identify the fertility procedure.
Please enter the transfer date (date embryos transferred to the mother?s uterus or fallopian tube) as listed in the chart.
Please enter the retrieval date (date eggs were harvested from the mother) as listed in the chart.
